deltaboard_sidebar_regex: \(HTTP://DB3 AUTO UPDATES START HERE\)(.*)\(HTTP://DB3 AUTO UPDATES END HERE\)
default_hidden_params_comment: This is hidden text for DB3 to parse. Please contact the author of DB3 if you see this

private_messages.mod_added_delta_notification_message: The 'add' command has been used by /u/{{username}} on [this comment]({{commentlink}}).
private_messages.mod_force_added_delta_notification_messa: The 'force add' command has been used by /u/{{username}} on [this comment]({{commentlink}}).
private_messages.mod_deleted_delta_notification_message: The 'delete' command has been used by /u/{{username}} on [this comment]({{commentlink}}).
private_messages.first_delta_message:
Congratulations - you've earned your first delta!

As you may already know, a delta (∆) is given when a comment has changed someone's view. For a more detailed explanation of the delta system and DeltaBot, [see here](https://www.reddit.com/r/changemyview/wiki/deltasystem).

I have updated your user flair and created [your own wiki page](https://reddit.com/r/{{subreddit}}/wiki/user/{{username}}) which will be updated every time you earn a delta. If you do well, you may find yourself on our [deltaboards](http://www.reddit.com/r/{{subreddit}}/wiki/deltaboards).

Good luck, and happy CMVing!

---

[*^(I am a bot)*](https://github.com/hallidev/delta-bot-four)*^(, and this action was performed automatically. )*[*^(Please contact the moderators)*](http://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=/r/{{subreddit}})*^( if you have any further questions or concerns.)*
private_messages.delta_in_quote_subject: You included a delta in a quote
private_messages.delta_in_quote_message:
Hi, {{username}}.

Your recent comment in /r/{{subreddit}} includes a delta in a reddit quote, which I'm programmed to ignore. This is to provide an easy way for users to explain how/when to use deltas, or discuss a comment that includes one, without accidentally awarding one themselves.

If you already knew this and weren't trying to award a delta, please reply to this PM with the word STOP to prevent me from sending this message to you in the future.

If you were trying to award a delta, please edit your comment to remove the '>' in front of it, and make sure you've explained how your view has changed. I will then automatically recheck your comment.

Thanks!
private_messages.confirm_stop_quoted_delta_warning_messag: You will no longer receive warnings for quoted deltas.

comments.post_sticky_deltas:
/u/{{username}} (OP) has awarded {{count}} delta(s) in this post.

All comments that earned deltas (from OP or other users) are listed [here]({{postlink}}), in /r/{{deltalogsubreddit}}.

Please note that a change of view doesn't necessarily mean a reversal, or that the conversation has ended.
comments.post_sticky_watt: OP has written a [reflective article]({{wattlink}}) about this CMV post at [projectWATT.com](https://projectwatt.com).
comments.comment_too_short:
This delta has been rejected. The length of your comment suggests that you haven't properly explained how /u/{{parentauthorname}} changed your view (comment rule 4).

DeltaBot is able to rescan edited comments. Please edit your comment with the required explanation.
comments.cannot_award_op:
This delta has been rejected. You can't award OP a delta.

Allowing this would wrongly suggest that you can post here with the aim of convincing others.

If you were explaining when/how to award a delta, please use a reddit quote for the symbol next time.
comments.cannot_award_deltabot: This delta has been rejected. You can't award DeltaBot a delta.
comments.cannot_award_self: This delta has been rejected. You can't award yourself a delta.
comments.cannot_award_twice: This delta has been rejected. You have already awarded /u/{{parentauthorname}} a delta for this comment.
comments.moderator_added:
The moderators have confirmed, either contextually or directly, that this is a delta-worthy acknowledgement of change.

1 delta awarded to /u/{{parentauthorname}} ([{{deltas}}∆](/r/{{subreddit}}/wiki/user/{{parentauthorname}})).
comments.moderator_removed: The moderators have confirmed that this is either delta misuse/abuse or an accidental delta. It has been removed from our records.
